items: Ensure Node.js ≥10.13 and npm/Yarn stable: `nvm use 10.13` or `nvm install 10.13`
Clean workspace by deleting node_modules and package-lock.json: `rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json`
Update Angular CLI and core to v9: `ng update @angular/cli@9 @angular/core@9`
Upgrade TypeScript to ≥3.6: `npm install typescript@>=3.6 <3.8`
Enable Ivy (default in v9) in tsconfig.json: `angularCompilerOptions: { "enableIvy": true }`
Refactor lazy-loaded routes to dynamic imports: `loadChildren: () => import('./module').then(m => m.Module)`
If using i18n, add Angular localize: `ng add @angular/localize`
Update dependencies like RxJS and Angular Material: `ng update rxjs @angular/material@9`
Run ngcc for third-party libraries if needed: `ngcc --properties es2015 browser module main --first-only`
Rebuild and test: `ng build && ng test && ng e2e`
Ensure Node.js ≥10.13: `nvm use 10.13` or `nvm install 10.13`
Update Angular CLI and core to v10: `ng update @angular/cli@10 @angular/core@10`
Upgrade TypeScript to ≥3.9: `npm install typescript@>=3.9 <4.0`
Update RxJS to ≥6.5.5: `ng update rxjs`
Check and refactor deprecated APIs (e.g., TestBed.get to TestBed.inject): `ng update`
Update Angular Material to v10 if used: `ng update @angular/material@10`
Remove IE 9/10 polyfills from browserslist: `not IE 9-10`
Rebuild and test: `ng build && ng test && ng e2e`
Ensure Node.js ≥12.14: `nvm use 12.14` or `nvm install 12.14`
Update Angular CLI and core to v11: `ng update @angular/cli@11 @angular/core@11`
Upgrade TypeScript to ≥4.0: `npm install typescript@>=4.0 <4.2`
Remove deprecated APIs (e.g., legacy FormBuilder.group): `ng update`
Run CLI migration scripts: `ng update --force`
Update Angular Material to v11 if used: `ng update @angular/material@11`
Enable Hot Module Replacement (optional): `ng serve --hmr`
Rebuild and test: `ng build && ng test && ng e2e`
Ensure Node.js ≥12.20 or ≥14.15: `nvm use 14.15` or `nvm install 14.15`
Update Angular CLI and core to v12: `ng update @angular/cli@12 @angular/core@12`
Upgrade TypeScript to ≥4.2: `npm install typescript@>=4.2 <4.4`
Enable strict mode in tsconfig.json (optional): `"strict": true`
Remove View Engine (deprecated) from tsconfig.json: Remove `enableIvy: false`
Update Angular Material to v12 if used: `ng update @angular/material@12`
Check for deprecated async pipe patterns: `ng update`
Rebuild and test: `ng build && ng test && ng e2e`
Ensure Node.js ≥14.15: `nvm use 14.15` or `nvm install 14.15`
Update Angular CLI and core to v13: `ng update @angular/cli@13 @angular/core@13`
Upgrade TypeScript to ≥4.4: `npm install typescript@>=4.4 <4.6`
Remove IE11 support from browserslist: `not IE 11`
Enable persistent build cache in angular.json: `"cache": { "enabled": true }`
Update Angular Material to v13 if used: `ng update @angular/material@13`
Rebuild and test: `ng build && ng test && ng e2e`
Ensure Node.js ≥14.15 or ≥16.10: `nvm use 16.10` or `nvm install 16.10`
Update Angular CLI and core to v14: `ng update @angular/cli@14 @angular/core@14`
Upgrade TypeScript to ≥4.6: `npm install typescript@>=4.6 <4.8`
Adopt standalone components (optional): `ng generate component --standalone`
Enable typed reactive forms: `new FormControl<string>('')`
Update Angular Material to v14 if used: `ng update @angular/material@14`
Check for deprecated router APIs: `ng update`
Rebuild and test: `ng build && ng test && ng e2e`
Ensure Node.js ≥14.20 or ≥16.13: `nvm use 16.13` or `nvm install 16.13`
Update Angular CLI and core to v15: `ng update @angular/cli@15 @angular/core@15`
Upgrade TypeScript to ≥4.8: `npm install typescript@>=4.8 <4.9`
Stabilize standalone components: Refactor NgModule to standalone
Migrate to MDC-based Angular Material: `ng update @angular/material@15`
Use functional route guards: `canActivate: [() => true]`
Rebuild and test: `ng build && ng test && ng e2e`
Ensure Node.js ≥16.14 or ≥18.10: `nvm use 18.10` or `nvm install 18.10`
Update Angular CLI and core to v16: `ng update @angular/cli@16 @angular/core@16`
Upgrade TypeScript to ≥4.9: `npm install typescript@>=4.9 <5.0`
Introduce Signals API (optional): Use `signal()` for reactive state
Enable hydration for SSR in app.module.ts: `provideClientHydration()`
Use DestroyRef for lifecycle hooks: `inject(DestroyRef).onDestroy(() => {...})`
Update Angular Material to v16 if used: `ng update @angular/material@16`
Rebuild and test: `ng build && ng test && ng e2e`
Ensure Node.js ≥18.13: `nvm use 18.13` or `nvm install 18.13`
Update Angular CLI and core to v17: `ng update @angular/cli@17 @angular/core@17`
Upgrade TypeScript to ≥5.0: `npm install typescript@>=5.0 <5.2`
Enable deferrable views: Use `@defer` and `@placeholder` in templates
Disable Zone.js for zoneless apps (optional): Remove `zone.js` import
Migrate to control flow syntax: Use `@if` and `@for` instead of `*ngIf`, `*ngFor`
Update Angular Material to v17 if used: `ng update @angular/material@17`
Rebuild and test: `ng build && ng test && ng e2e`
Ensure Node.js ≥18.13 or ≥20: `nvm use 20` or `nvm install 20`
Update Angular CLI and core to v18: `ng update @angular/cli@18 @angular/core@18`
Upgrade TypeScript to ≥5.2: `npm install typescript@>=5.2 <5.3`
Update Angular Material to v18: `ng update @angular/material@18`
Refactor deprecated lifecycle hooks: Check Angular 18 release notes
Rebuild and test: `ng build && ng test && ng e2e`
Ensure Node.js ≥18.13 or ≥20: `nvm use 20` or `nvm install 20`
Update Angular CLI and core to v19: `ng update @angular/cli@19 @angular/core@19`
Upgrade TypeScript to ≥5.3: `npm install typescript@>=5.3 <5.4`
Enable standalone imports: Refactor NgModule to standalone APIs
Review forms APIs: Adopt `formSignal()` for Signals-based forms
Enable esbuild builder (optional) in angular.json: `"builder": "@angular-devkit/build-angular:esbuild"`
Update Angular Material to v19 if used: `ng update @angular/material@19`
Rebuild and test: `ng build && ng test && ng e2e`
Ensure Node.js ≥20: `nvm use 20` or `nvm install 20`
Update Angular CLI and core to v20: `ng update @angular/cli@20 @angular/core@20`
Upgrade TypeScript to ≥5.4: `npm install typescript@>=5.4`
Adopt Signals and zoneless change detection: Remove `zone.js` import
Use control-flow syntax by default: `@if`, `@for` in templates
Update forms to use `formSignal()` for Signals-based reactivity
Update Angular Material to v20 if used: `ng update @angular/material@20`
Rebuild, test, and deploy: `ng build && ng test && ng e2e && ng deploy`
